definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: To want to scream obscenities, but to wiser and more disciplined than that.
sentences.chinese: 想要张狂地尖叫，但是智慧和自律总会将之代替。

sentences.english: And blights with Plagues the Marriage hearse.
sentences.chinese: 带者瘟疫肆虐张狂，直把婚礼变成灵堂。

sentences.english: If you give me glory days, I set the day than it.
sentences.chinese: 天若赐我辉煌，我定比天张狂。

sentences.english: But for the most part, there isn't all that much to shake.
sentences.chinese: 但是大部分的时候，他们没那么张狂。

sentences.english: Read the newspaper and you’ll find youth 8)on the rampage.
sentences.chinese: 打开报纸，你会发现年轻人张狂冲动。

sentences.english: Read the newspaper and you'll find youth on the rampage.
sentences.chinese: 打开报纸，你会发现年轻人张狂冲动。

sentences.english: Which have these waiter girls rude leeway.
sentences.chinese: 哪有这些丫鬟们张狂的余地。

definition: to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
to speak conceited nonsense/to come out with arrogant claptrap
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
not to know the immensity of heaven and earth/an exaggerated opinion of one's own abilities
pinyin: bu4 zhi1 tian1 gao1 di4 hou4
